item.title: VulnCon 2025Call for Papers Closes January 15 (EXTENDED TO JANUARY 31)
item.description: VulnCon 2025Call for Papers Closes January 15 (EXTENDED TO JANUARY 31)blogBy CVE Program|January 7, 2025TheCVE ProgramandFIRSTwill co-hostVulnCon 2025at the McKimmon Center in Raleigh, North Carolina, USA, on April 7-10, 2025. TheCall for Paperscloses on January 15, 2025 (EXTENDED TO JANUARY 31). See detailshere.IMPORTANT:The VulnCon 2025 Call for Papersdeadline has been extended until January 31, 2025.

item.title: CVE Program Expands Partnership with Thales Group
item.description: CVE Program Expands Partnership with Thales GroupblogBy CVE Program|January 7, 2025TheCVE® Programis expanding its partnership withThales Groupfor managing the assignment ofCVE Identifiers (CVE IDs)and publication ofCVE Recordsfor the CVE Program.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 236 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for January 13, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 236 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for January 13, 2025blogBy CVE Program|January 14, 2025The “CNA Enrichment Recognition List” for January 13, 2025, is now available with 236 CNAs listed. Published every two weeks on the CVE website, the list recognizes thoseCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)that are actively providing enhanced vulnerability data in theirCVE Records. CNAs are added to the list if they provideCommon Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)andCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE™)information 98% of the time or more within the two-week period of their last published CVE Record.

item.title: New Call for Papers Deadline forVulnCon 2025— January 31, 2025
item.description: New Call for Papers Deadline forVulnCon 2025— January 31, 2025blogBy CVE Program|January 21, 2025TheCVE ProgramandFIRSTwill co-hostVulnCon 2025at the McKimmon Center in Raleigh, North Carolina, USA, on April 7-10, 2025. TheCall for Papersdeadlinehas been extended until January 31, 2025. See detailshere.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 242 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for January 27, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 242 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for January 27, 2025blogBy CVE Program|January 28, 2025The “CNA Enrichment Recognition List” for January 27, 2025, is now available with 242 CNAs listed. Published every two weeks on the CVE website, the list recognizes thoseCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)that are actively providing enhanced vulnerability data in theirCVE Records. CNAs are added to the list if they provideCommon Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)andCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE™)information 98% of the time or more within the two-week period of their last published CVE Record.

item.title: Guide for Including CPE Applicability Statements in CVE Records Now Available for CNAs
item.description: Guide for Including CPE Applicability Statements in CVE Records Now Available for CNAsblogBy CVE Program|January 28, 2025TheCVE® Programis pleased to announce that a “Quick Start Guide for CPE Applicability Statements in the CVE Record Format” (PDF, 3.1MB) is now available forCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)on the CVE website. A “live” version of this document isavailable for CNAs on Google Docs, which will be updated over time as needed.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on January 8 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on January 8 Now AvailablenewsFebruary 4, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on January 8, 2025. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: 25 Years of CVE and What’s Next
item.description: 25 Years of CVE and What’s NextpodcastFebruary 4, 2025Host Shannon Sabens speaks with fellowCVE Boardmembers Kent Landfield and Madison Oliver andCVE ProgramLead Alec Summers about the25th anniversary of the CVE Program. Topics include the history of the program, the program today, and what’s next.

item.title: Register Now forCVE/FIRST VulnCon 2025on April 7-10, 2025!

item.title: HemoCue Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: HemoCue Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsFebruary 4, 2025HemoCue ABis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for HemoCue branded products and technologies only.
